mapper.select: SELECT count(temp.CKMC) TOTAL,temp.CKMC,sum(temp.F6) as SJJE FROM ( SELECT QDMC, CKMC, RQ, datepart( YEAR, RQ ) F1, datepart( quarter, RQ ) F2, str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) % 10, 1 ) F3, str( datepart( week, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( week, RQ ) % 10, 1 ) F4, SHRQ, DJMC, DJBH, YDJH, GHSDM, GHSMC, CKDM, YGMC, ZDR, ZY, SPMC, SX8MC, SUM ( SL ) F5, SUM ( JE ) F6 FROM ( SELECT VW_SPJHMX.RQ, VW_SPJHMX.SHRQ, VW_SPJHMX.DJMC, VW_SPJHMX.DJBH, VW_SPJHMX.YDJH, QUDAO.QDMC, GONGHUOSHANG.GHSDM, GONGHUOSHANG.GHSMC, CANGKU.CKDM, CANGKU.CKMC, YUANGONG.YGMC, VW_SPJHMX.ZDR, VW_SPJHMX.ZY, SHANGPIN.SPMC, FJSX8.SXMC AS SX8MC, SUM ( VW_SPJHMX.SL ) AS SL, SUM ( VW_SPJHMX.JE ) AS JE FROM VW_SPJHMX LEFT JOIN FZXX ON VW_SPJHMX.FZXX= FZXX.FZDM LEFT JOIN PICI ON VW_SPJHMX.PCDM= PICI.PCDM , GONGHUOSHANG, CANGKU, SHANGPIN LEFT JOIN SHANGPIN_A ON SHANGPIN_A.SPDM= SHANGPIN.SPDM LEFT JOIN GONGHUOSHANG GHS ON SHANGPIN_A.GHSDM= GHS.GHSDM , QUDAO ( NOLOCK ), YUANGONG ( NOLOCK ), FJSX8 ( NOLOCK ) WHERE VW_SPJHMX.DM1= GONGHUOSHANG.GHSDM AND VW_SPJHMX.DM2= CANGKU.CKDM AND VW_SPJHMX.SPDM= SHANGPIN.SPDM AND QUDAO.QDDM= VW_SPJHMX.QDDM AND VW_SPJHMX.YGDM= YUANGONG.YGDM AND SHANGPIN.FJSX8= FJSX8.SXDM AND VW_SPJHMX.RQ between #{lastMonth26} and #{currentMonth25} GROUP BY VW_SPJHMX.RQ, VW_SPJHMX.SHRQ, VW_SPJHMX.DJMC, VW_SPJHMX.DJBH, VW_SPJHMX.YDJH, QUDAO.QDMC, GONGHUOSHANG.GHSDM, GONGHUOSHANG.GHSMC, CANGKU.CKDM, CANGKU.CKMC, YUANGONG.YGMC, VW_SPJHMX.ZDR, VW_SPJHMX.ZY, SHANGPIN.SPMC, FJSX8.SXMC ) AS v1 GROUP BY QDMC, CKMC, RQ, datepart( YEAR, RQ ), datepart( quarter, RQ ), str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) % 10, 1 ), str( datepart( week, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( week, RQ ) % 10, 1 ), SHRQ, DJMC, DJBH, YDJH, GHSDM, GHSMC, CKDM, YGMC, ZDR, ZY, SPMC, SX8MC ) AS temp WHERE temp.DJMC = '商品进货单' GROUP BY temp.CKMC

select temp.* from (SELECT QDMC, CKMC, RQ, datepart( YEAR, RQ ) F1, datepart( quarter, RQ ) F2, str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) % 10, 1 ) F3, str( datepart( week, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( week, RQ ) % 10, 1 ) F4, SHRQ, DJMC, DJBH, YDJH, GHSDM, GHSMC, CKDM, YGMC, ZDR, ZY, SPMC, SX8MC, SUM ( SL ) F5, SUM ( JE ) F6 FROM ( SELECT VW_SPJHMX.RQ, VW_SPJHMX.SHRQ, VW_SPJHMX.DJMC, VW_SPJHMX.DJBH, VW_SPJHMX.YDJH, QUDAO.QDMC, GONGHUOSHANG.GHSDM, GONGHUOSHANG.GHSMC, CANGKU.CKDM, CANGKU.CKMC, YUANGONG.YGMC, VW_SPJHMX.ZDR, VW_SPJHMX.ZY, SHANGPIN.SPMC, FJSX8.SXMC AS SX8MC, SUM ( VW_SPJHMX.SL ) AS SL, SUM ( VW_SPJHMX.JE ) AS JE FROM VW_SPJHMX LEFT JOIN FZXX ON VW_SPJHMX.FZXX= FZXX.FZDM LEFT JOIN PICI ON VW_SPJHMX.PCDM= PICI.PCDM , GONGHUOSHANG, CANGKU, SHANGPIN LEFT JOIN SHANGPIN_A ON SHANGPIN_A.SPDM= SHANGPIN.SPDM LEFT JOIN GONGHUOSHANG GHS ON SHANGPIN_A.GHSDM= GHS.GHSDM , QUDAO ( NOLOCK ), YUANGONG ( NOLOCK ), FJSX8 ( NOLOCK ) WHERE VW_SPJHMX.DM1= GONGHUOSHANG.GHSDM AND VW_SPJHMX.DM2= CANGKU.CKDM AND VW_SPJHMX.SPDM= SHANGPIN.SPDM AND QUDAO.QDDM= VW_SPJHMX.QDDM AND VW_SPJHMX.YGDM= YUANGONG.YGDM AND SHANGPIN.FJSX8= FJSX8.SXDM AND VW_SPJHMX.RQ between #{lastMonth26} and #{currentMonth25} GROUP BY VW_SPJHMX.RQ, VW_SPJHMX.SHRQ, VW_SPJHMX.DJMC, VW_SPJHMX.DJBH, VW_SPJHMX.YDJH, QUDAO.QDMC, GONGHUOSHANG.GHSDM, GONGHUOSHANG.GHSMC, CANGKU.CKDM, CANGKU.CKMC, YUANGONG.YGMC, VW_SPJHMX.ZDR, VW_SPJHMX.ZY, SHANGPIN.SPMC, FJSX8.SXMC ) AS v1 GROUP BY QDMC, CKMC, RQ, datepart( YEAR, RQ ), datepart( quarter, RQ ), str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) % 10, 1 ), str( datepart( week, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( week, RQ ) % 10, 1 ), SHRQ, DJMC, DJBH, YDJH, GHSDM, GHSMC, CKDM, YGMC, ZDR, ZY, SPMC, SX8MC ) AS temp WHERE temp.DJMC = '商品进货单'

SELECT count(temp.CKMC) TOTAL,temp.CKMC,sum(temp.F6) as SJJE FROM ( SELECT QDMC, CKMC, RQ, datepart( YEAR, RQ ) F1, datepart( quarter, RQ ) F2, str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) % 10, 1 ) F3, str( datepart( week, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( week, RQ ) % 10, 1 ) F4, SHRQ, DJMC, DJBH, YDJH, GHSDM, GHSMC, CKDM, YGMC, ZDR, ZY, SPMC, SX8MC, ABS(SUM ( SL )) F5, ABS(SUM ( JE )) F6 FROM ( SELECT VW_SPJHMX.RQ, VW_SPJHMX.SHRQ, VW_SPJHMX.DJMC, VW_SPJHMX.DJBH, VW_SPJHMX.YDJH, QUDAO.QDMC, GONGHUOSHANG.GHSDM, GONGHUOSHANG.GHSMC, CANGKU.CKDM, CANGKU.CKMC, YUANGONG.YGMC, VW_SPJHMX.ZDR, VW_SPJHMX.ZY, SHANGPIN.SPMC, FJSX8.SXMC AS SX8MC, SUM ( VW_SPJHMX.SL ) AS SL, SUM ( VW_SPJHMX.JE ) AS JE FROM VW_SPJHMX LEFT JOIN FZXX ON VW_SPJHMX.FZXX= FZXX.FZDM LEFT JOIN PICI ON VW_SPJHMX.PCDM= PICI.PCDM , GONGHUOSHANG, CANGKU, SHANGPIN LEFT JOIN SHANGPIN_A ON SHANGPIN_A.SPDM= SHANGPIN.SPDM LEFT JOIN GONGHUOSHANG GHS ON SHANGPIN_A.GHSDM= GHS.GHSDM , QUDAO ( NOLOCK ), YUANGONG ( NOLOCK ), FJSX8 ( NOLOCK ) WHERE VW_SPJHMX.DM1= GONGHUOSHANG.GHSDM AND VW_SPJHMX.DM2= CANGKU.CKDM AND VW_SPJHMX.SPDM= SHANGPIN.SPDM AND QUDAO.QDDM= VW_SPJHMX.QDDM AND VW_SPJHMX.YGDM= YUANGONG.YGDM AND SHANGPIN.FJSX8= FJSX8.SXDM AND VW_SPJHMX.RQ between #{lastMonth26} and #{currentMonth25} GROUP BY VW_SPJHMX.RQ, VW_SPJHMX.SHRQ, VW_SPJHMX.DJMC, VW_SPJHMX.DJBH, VW_SPJHMX.YDJH, QUDAO.QDMC, GONGHUOSHANG.GHSDM, GONGHUOSHANG.GHSMC, CANGKU.CKDM, CANGKU.CKMC, YUANGONG.YGMC, VW_SPJHMX.ZDR, VW_SPJHMX.ZY, SHANGPIN.SPMC, FJSX8.SXMC ) AS v1 GROUP BY QDMC, CKMC, RQ, datepart( YEAR, RQ ), datepart( quarter, RQ ), str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) % 10, 1 ), str( datepart( week, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( week, RQ ) % 10, 1 ), SHRQ, DJMC, DJBH, YDJH, GHSDM, GHSMC, CKDM, YGMC, ZDR, ZY, SPMC, SX8MC ) AS temp WHERE temp.DJMC = '商品退货单' GROUP BY temp.CKMC

select temp.* from (SELECT QDMC, CKMC, RQ, datepart( YEAR, RQ ) F1, datepart( quarter, RQ ) F2, str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) % 10, 1 ) F3, str( datepart( week, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( week, RQ ) % 10, 1 ) F4, SHRQ, DJMC, DJBH, YDJH, GHSDM, GHSMC, CKDM, YGMC, ZDR, ZY, SPMC, SX8MC, ABS(SUM ( SL )) F5, ABS(SUM ( JE )) F6 FROM ( SELECT VW_SPJHMX.RQ, VW_SPJHMX.SHRQ, VW_SPJHMX.DJMC, VW_SPJHMX.DJBH, VW_SPJHMX.YDJH, QUDAO.QDMC, GONGHUOSHANG.GHSDM, GONGHUOSHANG.GHSMC, CANGKU.CKDM, CANGKU.CKMC, YUANGONG.YGMC, VW_SPJHMX.ZDR, VW_SPJHMX.ZY, SHANGPIN.SPMC, FJSX8.SXMC AS SX8MC, SUM ( VW_SPJHMX.SL ) AS SL, SUM ( VW_SPJHMX.JE ) AS JE FROM VW_SPJHMX LEFT JOIN FZXX ON VW_SPJHMX.FZXX= FZXX.FZDM LEFT JOIN PICI ON VW_SPJHMX.PCDM= PICI.PCDM , GONGHUOSHANG, CANGKU, SHANGPIN LEFT JOIN SHANGPIN_A ON SHANGPIN_A.SPDM= SHANGPIN.SPDM LEFT JOIN GONGHUOSHANG GHS ON SHANGPIN_A.GHSDM= GHS.GHSDM , QUDAO ( NOLOCK ), YUANGONG ( NOLOCK ), FJSX8 ( NOLOCK ) WHERE VW_SPJHMX.DM1= GONGHUOSHANG.GHSDM AND VW_SPJHMX.DM2= CANGKU.CKDM AND VW_SPJHMX.SPDM= SHANGPIN.SPDM AND QUDAO.QDDM= VW_SPJHMX.QDDM AND VW_SPJHMX.YGDM= YUANGONG.YGDM AND SHANGPIN.FJSX8= FJSX8.SXDM AND VW_SPJHMX.RQ between #{lastMonth26} and #{currentMonth25} GROUP BY VW_SPJHMX.RQ, VW_SPJHMX.SHRQ, VW_SPJHMX.DJMC, VW_SPJHMX.DJBH, VW_SPJHMX.YDJH, QUDAO.QDMC, GONGHUOSHANG.GHSDM, GONGHUOSHANG.GHSMC, CANGKU.CKDM, CANGKU.CKMC, YUANGONG.YGMC, VW_SPJHMX.ZDR, VW_SPJHMX.ZY, SHANGPIN.SPMC, FJSX8.SXMC ) AS v1 GROUP BY QDMC, CKMC, RQ, datepart( YEAR, RQ ), datepart( quarter, RQ ), str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( MONTH, RQ ) % 10, 1 ), str( datepart( week, RQ ) / 10, 1 ) + str( datepart( week, RQ ) % 10, 1 ), SHRQ, DJMC, DJBH, YDJH, GHSDM, GHSMC, CKDM, YGMC, ZDR, ZY, SPMC, SX8MC ) AS temp WHERE temp.DJMC = '商品退货单'
